com.microsoft.azure.management.compute

Class VirtualMachineOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.management.compute.VirtualMachineOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VirtualMachineOperations, ServiceOperations<ComputeManagementClientImpl>

    public class VirtualMachineOperationsImpl
extends Object
implements ServiceOperations<ComputeManagementClientImpl>, VirtualMachineOperations
    Operations for managing the virtual machines in compute management.

      • listAllAsync

        public Future<VirtualMachineListResponse> listAllAsync(ListParameters parameters)
        Gets the list of Virtual Machines in the subscription. Use nextLink property in the response to get the next page of Virtual Machines. Do this till nextLink is not null to fetch all the Virtual Machines.
        Specified by:
        listAllAsync in interface VirtualMachineOperations
        Parameters:
        parameters - Optional.
        Returns:
        The List Virtual Machine operation response.

        Parameters:

        vmName - Required. The name of the virtual machine.
        Returns:
        The List Virtual Machine operation response.
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.

      • listNextAsync

        public Future<VirtualMachineListResponse> listNextAsync(String nextLink)
        Gets the next page of Virtual Machines. NextLink is obtained by making a ListAll() callwhich fetches the first page of Virtual Machines and a link to fetch the next page.
        Specified by:
        listNextAsync in interface VirtualMachineOperations
        Parameters:
        nextLink - Required. NextLink from the previous successful call to ListVirtualMachines operation.
        Returns:
        The List Virtual Machine operation response.
